high_descs: Turn right and head to the sink
Pick up the candle that is sitting to the right of the faucet
Take a step backwards, then a step to your left, continue facing the sink and also the toilet
Place the candle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on the back of a toilet

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the sink.
Put the candle on the front left corner of the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank.

high_descs: take a few step forward and turn to the right and go to the sink
pick up the green candle form the back of the sink
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and take a few steps and  turn to the left facing the right of the sink
Put the green candle on the toilet tank right of the sink
anns.task_desc: Place a green candle on the toilet tank
